questions.question: Which of the following countries is not a member of G7?
questions.explanation: The Group of Seven is an intergovernmental political and economic forum consisting of Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom and the United States additionally the European Union is a "non-enumerated member." G7 is founded in 1975. Formerly called library Group, Group of Six (G6), Group of Eight (G8).

questions.question: Which of the following companies has implanted a chip in à human brain for the first time?
questions.explanation: Solve Elon Musk's Controversial Startup Neuralink has implanted a chip in a human brain for the first time. Neuralitk is a brain-chip startup founded by Elon Musk in 2016.

questions.question: Who has been selected as the best athlete of the year by Time Magazine in 2023?
questions.explanation: Lionel Messi is the best athlete of the year by Time Magazine in 2023.

questions.question: Which of the following Cricket Bat Manufacturers in Bangladesh has received approval from the ICC?
questions.explanation: Rajshahi-based bat manufacturer MKS sports has received approval from the International Cricket Council (ICC) and Can now plaster its logo on bats and the other equipment’s in international cricket.

questions.question: What is Generative AI?

options.label: ক
options.text: AI that generates new content or data

options.label: খ
options.text: AI that focuses on analyzing data

options.label: গ
options.text: AI used for automating repetitive tasks

questions.option_a: AI that generates new content or data
questions.option_b: AI that focuses on analyzing data
questions.option_c: AI used for automating repetitive tasks
questions.explanation: Generative Artificial Intelligence is artificial intelligence capable of generating text, images, videos, or other data using generative models, often in response to prompts. Generative AI models learn the patterns and structure of their input training data and then generate new data that has similar characteristics.

questions.question: Who is the president of the National Assembly of Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: The Speaker Shirin Sharmin Chaudhury is the president of the National Assembly of Bangladesh.

questions.question: Which of the following commodities is the number one export item from Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: Knitwear and Ready made garments Products is the number one export item from Bangladesh.

questions.question: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 will be hosted by-
questions.explanation: In 2024, 9th T20 World Cup- India, New Zealand, England, Pakistan, Austrila, South Africa, Afganistan, Srilanka, Netherlands and Bangladesh has received direct qualificatiion. The host nations is West Indies and the USA T20 World Cup. In this event India became Champion.

questions.question: In 2025, COP30 will be held in-
questions.explanation: The decision to host the 30th Conference of the Parties (COP) to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) in Brazil between November 10 and 21, 2025. It was approved on monday, December 21, 2023.

questions.question: Bangladesh Bank is likely to introduce new exchange rate system called-
questions.explanation: In this perspective, The Bangladesh Bank is going to implement a new crawling peg system in which the exchange rate will be set based on a real effective exchange rate measured with 15 trading partners.

questions.question: How many women candidates have been elected as MP in the 12 th parliament election in Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: The 12th general elections were held in Bangladesh on 7 January 2024 There are 19 women candidates have been elected as MP in the 12th parliament election in Bangladesh.

questions.question: According to the Population and Housing Census 2022, what was the total number of household in Bangladesh in million?
questions.explanation: In 2022 Bangladesh census was a detailed enumeration of the Bangladesh population constituting the sixth national census in the country. It was held by, the supervision of Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics and the reference day used for the census will be June 15, 2022. The total number of household in Bangladesh in 41 million.

questions.question: Odessa is a major seaport in
questions.explanation: The port of Odessa located near Odessa, is the largest Ukrainian sea port and one of the largest ports in the Black Sea basin, with a total annual traffic capacity of 40 million tonnes, the only port of Ukraine capable of accepting panamax class vessels.

questions.question: Which international organization was a major financial contributor 'to the construction of the Bangladesh Sheikh Mujib Railway Bridge?
questions.explanation: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Railway Bridge construction project is the largest railway bridge in Bangladesh which is located on the Jamuna river. AKSID Corporation Limited is the subcontractor of this project and is owned by Bangladesh Railway which is founded by Japan International Co-operation Agency (JICA) and Bangladesh Railway Jointly.

questions.question: What is a key characteristic of the Fourth Industrial Revolution?

options.label: গ
options.text: Integration of physical and digital technologies

questions.option_c: Integration of physical and digital technologies
questions.explanation: The Fourth Industrial Revolution is the trend towards automation and data exchange in manufacturing technologies and processes which include cyber-physical system (cps), IOT, industrial internet of things, cloud computing, cognitive computing, and artificial intelligence.

questions.question: Identify the error in the following sentence: She is one of the best teacher in our school.
questions.explanation: One of the এরপর degree তে noun plural বসাতে হয়। অন্যান্য option ঠিক আছে।

questions.question: Mother said to me, "Would you sign?" The indirect form of the speech is-

options.label: ক
options.text: Mother said me if I would sign.

options.label: খ
options.text: Mother said to me whether I will sign.

options.label: গ
options.text: Mother asked me if I would sign.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Mother asked me that whether I would sign.

questions.option_a: Mother said me if I would sign.
questions.option_b: Mother said to me whether I will sign.
questions.option_c: Mother asked me if I would sign.
questions.option_d: Mother asked me that whether I would sign.
questions.explanation: Interogative sentence এ reported speech কে indirect করার জন্য asked বসে এবং conjunction হিসেবে if বসে sentence টি Assertive হবে।

questions.question: Find out the correctly spelt word.
questions.explanation: অপশন C তে সঠিক বানান রয়েছে। অন্যগুলোর সঠিক রূপ Aberration, Commemorate, Camouflage.

questions.question: The synonym of 'AUGUR' is-
questions.explanation: Augur (ভবিষ্যৎ অনুমান তথ্য দানকারী) যার সমার্থক- Astrologer, Diviner। Prevaricate অর্থ সত্যের অপলাপ করা, Contrive → কার্যসাধন করা।

questions.question: It is good for salesmen to develop good rapport _______ their customers to gain their trust.
questions.explanation: সুসম্পর্ক স্থাপন বোঝাতে rapport এরপরে appropriate preposition হিসেবে with বসে।

questions.question: Sèlect the lettered pair that best expresses a relationship similar to that in the original pair. JEOPARDY: SECURITY::
questions.explanation: উপরের Analogy টি একে অপরের বিপরীত শব্দ। Jeopardy (বিপদ): Security (নিরাপদ) তেমনি Avarice লোভ যার বিপরীত generosity (উদারতা)।

questions.question: Identify the error: Had it not been for Mr. Shelby's prudence, the family will still has been imprisoned for a crime they did not commit.

options.label: গ
options.text: the family will still has been

questions.option_c: the family will still has been
questions.explanation: বাক্যের ২য় অংশে the family would still have been থাকলে সঠিক হতো।

questions.question: Whatsoever may happen, I will go for holidays. The underlined word is a/an-
questions.explanation: ২টি clause কে যে শব্দ দ্বারা যুক্ত করা হয় সেটি conjunction may happen একটি finite verb এবং will go ২য় অংশের finite verb। এখানে whatsoever একই সাথে conjunction এবং subordinate clause এর subject হিসেবে কাজ করছে।

questions.question: "Ball and chain"- the correct meaning of the idiom is-
questions.explanation: Ball and chain (পালানো ঠেকাতে বন্দির পায়ে বাঁধা অতিরিক্ত বোঝা/শিকল), যা অপশনে (A) তে পাওয়া যায়।

questions.question: "The report was written by the committee." The active voice of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: Having written the report, the committee submitted it.

options.label: খ
options.text: Writing the report was done by the committee.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: It was the committee who wrote the report.

questions.option_a: Having written the report, the committee submitted it.
questions.option_b: Writing the report was done by the committee.
questions.option_d: It was the committee who wrote the report.
questions.explanation: Was/were যুক্ত passive কে Active করতে main verb এর past form বসে এবং object টি subject এ রূপান্তর হয়।

questions.question: "He was born in the year of liberation." The complex form of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: In the liberation year he was born.

options.label: খ
options.text: In the year of liberation he was born.

options.label: গ
options.text: He was born in the year of liberation.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He was born when it was the year of liberation.

questions.option_a: In the liberation year he was born.
questions.option_b: In the year of liberation he was born.
questions.option_c: He was born in the year of liberation.
questions.option_d: He was born when it was the year of liberation.
questions.explanation: Simple থেকে complex করতে অর্থ ঠিক রেখে একটি conjunction ও বাক্যে ২টি finite verb লাগবে; যা (D) অপশনে আছে- was born, was এবং subordinate conjunction হিসেবে when।

questions.question: He will impart no information ___ anyone.
questions.explanation: Impart to (প্রদান করা) যথাযথ preposition।

questions.question: Choose the answer that best completes the analogy. King : Crown :: Flower:?
questions.explanation: রাজার মাথায় মুকুট (crown) থাকে, তেমনি ফুলে পরাগ (pollen) থাকে।

questions.question: They are afraid ______ getting mixed up ____ tribal.
questions.explanation: Afraid of (ভীতু), mixed up with (মিশে যাওয়া)।

questions.question: Which of the following words is a synonym for 'abundant'?
questions.explanation: Abundant অর্থ প্রচুর, যার সমার্থক plentiful. meager ও scarce অর্থ- স্বল্প।

questions.question: Identify the error: Asif gave up his ambition to become a member of the national cricket team due to his familly's high expectations.

options.label: খ
options.text: to become a member of the national

questions.option_b: to become a member of the national
questions.explanation: Gave up এরপর verb এর সাথে (ing) যুক্ত হয়, কিন্তু বাক্যে to become আছে যা ভুল।

questions.question: Select the lettered pair that best expresses a relationship similar to that in the original pair. Rehearsal : Performance : :
questions.explanation: Performance করার আগে Rehearsal করা হয় তেমনি marriage এর আগে Engagement করা হয়।

questions.question: The antonym of 'Encomium' is-
questions.explanation: Encomium অর্থ উচ্চ প্রশংসা, যার বিপরীত শব্দ Hyper criticism। Meager স্বল্প, Diffidence - দ্বিধা।

questions.question: "Sunidhi drew the curtains every evening before going to bed". The passive form of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: The curtains was drawn every evening before going to bed by Sunidhi.

options.label: খ
options.text: The curtains were drawn every evening by Sunidhi before going be bed.

options.label: গ
options.text: The curtains was dawning every evening before going to bed by Sunidhi.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The curtains were drawning by Sunidhi every evening before going to bed.

questions.option_a: The curtains was drawn every evening before going to bed by Sunidhi.
questions.option_b: The curtains were drawn every evening by Sunidhi before going be bed.
questions.option_c: The curtains was dawning every evening before going to bed by Sunidhi.
questions.option_d: The curtains were drawning by Sunidhi every evening before going to bed.
questions.explanation: Past tense এর বাক্য passive করতে was/were আসে, curtains plural তাই were হবে এবং draw verb এর v3 drewn বসবে।

questions.question: Find out the incorrectly spelt word.
questions.explanation: Option B তে সঠিক বানান হবে Aeronautical।

questions.question: Which books are you reading? The underlined word is a/an-
questions.explanation: আপনি কোন বই পড়ছেন। যেখানে which শব্দটি books- কে modify করে বিধায় এটি adjective হবে।

questions.question: What does the idiom "Barking up the wrong tree" mean?

options.label: ক
options.text: To be very calm and relaxed

options.label: খ
options.text: To pursue a mistaken or misguided course of action

options.label: গ
options.text: To make a start of something

options.label: ঘ
options.text: To follow your dreams, trying to do something that can't be achieved

questions.option_a: To be very calm and relaxed
questions.option_b: To pursue a mistaken or misguided course of action
questions.option_c: To make a start of something
questions.option_d: To follow your dreams, trying to do something that can't be achieved
questions.explanation: "Barking up the wrong tree" ভুল পন্থা অবলম্বন করা। যার সঠিক উত্তর (B) তে আছে।

questions.question: Fill in the blank: ___ Atacama desert in ___ Chile is ____ driest place on the Earth.
questions.explanation: Desert এর নামের আগে the বসবে এবং driest superlative form যার আগেও the বসবে কিন্তু Chile একটি দেশের নাম, এর পূর্বে article বসবে না।

questions.question: "You are the only person fit for the post. The negative form of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: The person is you who can fit for the post.

options.label: খ
options.text: No other person fit for the post.

options.label: গ
options.text: The person fit for the post is you only.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: No other person but you are fit for the post.

questions.option_a: The person is you who can fit for the post.
questions.option_b: No other person fit for the post.
questions.option_c: The person fit for the post is you only.
questions.option_d: No other person but you are fit for the post.
questions.explanation: Singular sub যুক্ত বাক্যকে negative করতে No other ….. but বসে। তুমি ছাড়া কেউই এই পোস্টের জন্য উপযুক্ত নয়।

questions.question: The teacher said to him, "Please tell me what the old man said today." The indirect form of the speech is-

options.label: ক
options.text: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man said that day.

options.label: খ
options.text: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man had said today

options.label: গ
options.text: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man had said that day.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man said today.

questions.option_a: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man said that day.
questions.option_b: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man had said today
questions.option_c: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man had said that day.
questions.option_d: The teacher requested him to tell him what the old man said today.
questions.explanation: Please থাকায় বাক্যটি indirect করতে request বসবে এবং reported speech past form থাকায় indirect এ past perfect হয়েছে, today পরিবর্তে that day বসেছে।

questions.question: "By fits and starts"- the correct meaning of the idiom is-
questions.explanation: মাঝে মাঝে খুব উৎসাহ দেখানো (irregularly)।

questions.question: "Mr. Lion wrote the letter and posted". The passive form of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: The letter was written and posted by Mr. Lion.

options.label: খ
options.text: The letter was writing and posted by Mr. Lion.

options.label: গ
options.text: Mr. Lion wrote the letter and then posted.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The letter was writing by Mr. Lion and posted.

questions.option_a: The letter was written and posted by Mr. Lion.
questions.option_b: The letter was writing and posted by Mr. Lion.
questions.option_c: Mr. Lion wrote the letter and then posted.
questions.option_d: The letter was writing by Mr. Lion and posted.
questions.explanation: Past tense যুক্ত বাক্য passive করতে sub singular হওয়ায় was বসবে এবং write verb এর v3 বসেছে।

questions.question: "Can you pay him in cash?" She said to me. The indirect form of the speech is-

options.label: ক
options.text: She asked me if I could pay him in cash.

options.label: খ
options.text: She asked me if I should pay him in cash.

options.label: গ
options.text: She asked me if I can pay him in cash.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: She asked me if he could pay me in cash.

questions.option_a: She asked me if I could pay him in cash.
questions.option_b: She asked me if I should pay him in cash.
questions.option_c: She asked me if I can pay him in cash.
questions.option_d: She asked me if he could pay me in cash.
questions.explanation: Interrogative বাক্যে asked বসে এবং if যুক্ত হয়। Me এর পরিবর্তে I, can = could বসেছে।

questions.question: "Teenagers don't like being told what to do." The passive form of the sentence is-

options.label: ক
options.text: Teenagers are not liking being told what to do.

options.label: খ
options.text: Teenagers should not be told what to do.

options.label: গ
options.text: Being told what to do was not being liked by teenagers.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Being told what to do is not liked by teenagers.

questions.option_a: Teenagers are not liking being told what to do.
questions.option_b: Teenagers should not be told what to do.
questions.option_c: Being told what to do was not being liked by teenagers.
questions.option_d: Being told what to do is not liked by teenagers.
questions.explanation: Present tense যুক্ত বাক্য passive করতে am, is, are বসে + V3 + By + বাকি অংশ বসে।

questions.question: Choose the correct option for the underlined part: He would surely assist me if I had requested him to do so.
questions.explanation: If + sub + verb (past perfect), সেক্ষেত্রে অপর অংশ sub + would + have + v3 বসে। তাই সঠিক উত্তর B।

questions.question: 'রেইনকোট' গল্পটি কোন গ্রন্থ থেকে সংকলিত?
questions.explanation: 'রেইনকোট' গল্পটি প্রকাশিত হয় ১৯৯৫ সালে। পরে এটি লেখকের সর্বশেষ গল্পগ্রন্থ 'জাল স্বপ্ন স্বপ্নের জাল' গ্রন্থে সংকলিত হয়। এ গল্পের পাঠ গ্রহণ করা হয়েছে 'আখতারুজ্জামান ইলিয়াস রচনাসমগ্র-১' থেকে।

questions.question: 'গাছপাথর' বান্ধারাটির অর্থ কী?
questions.explanation: গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বাগধারাঃ আকাশ কুসুম (অসম্ভব কল্পনা), অমাবস্যার চাঁদ (দুর্লভ বস্তু), কাঁঠালের আমসত্ত্ব (অসম্ভব বস্তু), বাঘের দুধ/চোখ (দুঃসাধ্য বস্তু)।

questions.question: কোনটি শুদ্ধ বানান?
questions.explanation: সঠিক বানান হচ্ছে - প্রত্যুদ্গমন।কিন্তু 'দ' এর নিচে (্ - হসন্ত) বসবে। সম্মুখে অগ্রসর হয়ে অভ্যর্থনা - প্রত্যুদ্গমন।

questions.question: 'ঊর্ণনাভ' শব্দটি দিয়ে বোঝায়-
questions.explanation: শব্দার্থ: এন্ডেমাল- প্রয়োগ, উষ্ণীষ- পাগড়ি, জইর- অত্যাচার, প্রগলভ-দাম্ভিক।

questions.question: কোনটি করণ কারকে শূন্য বিভক্তির উদাহরণ?
questions.explanation: 'করণ' শব্দটির অর্থ যন্ত্র, সহায়ক বা উপায়। ক্রিয়া সম্পাদনের যন্ত্র, উপকরণ বা সহায়ককেই করণ কারক বলে। যেমন: বুদ্ধি খাটিয়ে কাজ কর। মন দিয়ে বিদ্যালাভ কর।

questions.question: Which of the following statements are sufficient to answer following: Who is the tallest among six boys P, T, N, D, Q & R? i. P is taller than D and N but not as tall as T. ii. R is taller than Q but not as tall as T. iii. Q is not taller than T and R.
questions.explanation: In statements (I) T > P > D & N And in Statement (II) T > R > Q So, T is tallest and statement I and II are sufficient to find tallest.

questions.question: There are five books A, B, C, D and E. Book C lies above D, book E is below A, book D is above book A and book B is below book E. Which book is at the bottom?
questions.explanation: In condision: C > D, A > E, D > A, E > B so that the sequence from above: C>D>A>E>B ∴ Bottom book's is B

questions.question: 5862 is to 714 and 3498 is to 1113 and 9516 is to 156, therefore 8257 is to-

There are six persons A, B, C, D, E and F. C is the sister of F. B is the brother of E's husband. D is the father of A and grandfather of F. There are two fathers, three brothers and a mother in the group. Who is E's husband?
questions.explanation: Here, two fathers are D and A Three brothers are A, B and F and only mother E ∴ E's husband is A.

questions.question: Five friends are waiting in line to get coffee. Raihan is behind Joey, but not last. Sifat is behind Monica, who is in front of both Raihan and Joey. Rima is second. Who is at the front of the line?
questions.explanation: According to condition, Their waiting line will be Monica ← Rima ← Joey ← Raihan ← Sifat. So that, Monica is at the front of the line.

questions.question: Out of 60 children, 30 are happy, 10 are sad and 20 are neither happy nor sad. There are 20 boys and 40 girls. If there are 6 happy boys and 4 sad girls, how many girls are neither happy nor sad?
questions.explanation: Here, total children = 60 =60 = 60 Boys = 20 ; =20 ; = 20 ; Girls = 40 =40 = 40 Happy boys = 6 =6 = 6 , Happy girls = 30 − 6 = 24 =30-6=24 = 30 − 6 = 24 Sad girls = 4 ; =4 ; = 4 ; Sad boys = 10 − 4 = 6 =10-4=6 = 10 − 4 = 6 ∴ \therefore ∴ Total girls who are neither hapriy nor sad = 40 − ( 24 + 4 ) = 12 =40-(24+4)=12 = 40 − ( 24 + 4 ) = 12

questions.question: The ratio between the speeds of two trains is 7 : 8. If the second train runs 400 km in 4 hours, then the speed of the first train is-.
questions.explanation: Solve Second train's speed = ( 400 4 ) = 100   k m / h o u r =\left(\frac{400}{4}\right)=100 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{hour} = ( 4 400 ​ ) = 100   km / hour Now, let, the speed of the first train be 7x and second train be 8x ∴ 8 x = 100 ⇒ x = 100 8 = 12.5 \therefore 8 \mathrm{x}=100 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{100}{8}=12.5 ∴ 8 x = 100 ⇒ x = 8 100 ​ = 12.5 ∴ \therefore ∴ First train's speed = 7 × 12.5 = 87.5   k m / =7 \times 12.5=87.5 \mathrm{~km} / = 7 × 12.5 = 87.5   km / hour.

questions.question: Firm A produces 10% defective products, firm B produces 20% defective products and firm C produces 5% defective products. If choosing a firm is an equally likely event, then find the probability that the product chosen is defective.

To order certain plants from a catalog, it costs $ 3.00 per plant, plus a 5 percent sales tax, plus $ 6.95 for shipping and handling regardless of the number of plants ordered. If company C ordered these plants from the catalog at the total cost of $ 69.95, how many plants did Company C order?
questions.explanation: Solve Let, the number of plants be x x x ∴  Total cost  = $ 3 × x = $ 3 x  Sales tax  = $ 3 x × 5 100 = $ 3 x 20  ATQ,  3 x + 3 x 20 + 6.95 = 69.95 ⇒ 60 x + 3 x 20 = 69.95 − 6.95 ⇒ 63 x 20 = 63 ∴ x = 63 × 20 63 = 20 \begin{array}{l} \therefore \text { Total cost }=\$ 3 \times x=\$ 3 x \\ \text { Sales tax }=\$ 3 x \times \frac{5}{100}=\$ \frac{3 x}{20} \\ \text { ATQ, } 3 x+\frac{3 x}{20}+6.95=69.95 \\ \Rightarrow \frac{60 x+3 x}{20}=69.95-6.95 \\ \Rightarrow \frac{63 x}{20}=63 \therefore x=\frac{63 \times 20}{63}=20 \end{array} ∴  Total cost  = $3 × x = $3 x  Sales tax  = $3 x × 100 5 ​ = $ 20 3 x ​  ATQ,  3 x + 20 3 x ​ + 6.95 = 69.95 ⇒ 20 60 x + 3 x ​ = 69.95 − 6.95 ⇒ 20 63 x ​ = 63 ∴ x = 63 63 × 20 ​ = 20 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ Number of plants be 20

questions.question: Cheri is n + 3 years old. Raina is 6 years younger than Cheri and 2 years older than Jisan. What is the sum of the ages of all three?
questions.explanation: Cheri is = ( n + 3 ) =(\mathrm{n}+3) = ( n + 3 ) years Raina is = ( n + 3 − 6 ) = ( n − 3 ) =(\mathrm{n}+3-6)=(\mathrm{n}-3) = ( n + 3 − 6 ) = ( n − 3 ) years And Jisan is = ( n − 3 − 2 ) = ( n − 5 ) =(n-3-2)=(n-5) = ( n − 3 − 2 ) = ( n − 5 ) years ∴ \therefore ∴ Sum of their ages = ( n + 3 + n − 3 + n − 5 ) = ( 3 n − 5 ) =(n+3+n-3+n-5)=(3 n-5) = ( n + 3 + n − 3 + n − 5 ) = ( 3 n − 5 ) years.

questions.question: How many divisors does the number 540 have?
Odd man out and series: 16, 25, 36, 72, 144, 196, 225.

questions.question: A man sells a bicycle at marked price which is 30% higher than the price. If he gives some discount and sells it at Tk. 150 less than the marked price, he would still gain 20%. What is the percentage of discount offered?
questions.explanation: Let, cost price = 100 t k =100 \mathrm{tk} = 100 tk ∴ \therefore ∴ Marked price = ( 100 + 30 ) = 130 t k =(100+30)=130 \mathrm{tk} = ( 100 + 30 ) = 130 tk At 20 % 20 \% 20% gain, Selling price = ( 100 + 20 ) = 120 t k =(100+20)=120 \mathrm{tk} = ( 100 + 20 ) = 120 tk ∴ \therefore ∴ Discount = ( 130 − 120 ) = 10 t k =(130-120)=10 \mathrm{tk} = ( 130 − 120 ) = 10 tk . ∴ \therefore ∴ Percentage of discount offer = ( 10 130 × 100 ) % = 7.69 % =\left(\frac{10}{130} \times 100\right) \%=7.69 \% = ( 130 10 ​ × 100 ) % = 7.69%

questions.question: The product of one-third of a number and 150% of anothe number is what percent of the product of the original number?
questions.explanation: Let, two numbers be x , y x, y x , y and it's product x y x y x y  Again, it’s product  = x 3 × y × 150 % = x 3 × y × 150 100 = x y 2 ∴  Required percentage  = ( x y 2 ÷ x y ) × 100 % = ( x y 2 × 1 x y × 100 ) % = 50 % \begin{array}{l} \text { Again, it's product }=\frac{x}{3} \times y \times 150 \%=\frac{x}{3} \times y \times \frac{150}{100}=\frac{x y}{2} \\ \begin{aligned} \therefore \text { Required percentage }=\left(\frac{x y}{2} \div x y\right) \times 100 \% & =\left(\frac{x y}{2} \times \frac{1}{x y} \times 100\right) \% \\ & =50 \% \end{aligned} \end{array}  Again, it’s product  = 3 x ​ × y × 150% = 3 x ​ × y × 100 150 ​ = 2 x y ​ ∴  Required percentage  = ( 2 x y ​ ÷ x y ) × 100% ​ = ( 2 x y ​ × x y 1 ​ × 100 ) % = 50% ​ ​

questions.question: A man has some hens and cows. If the number of heads be 48 and number of feet equal 140 the number of hens will be?
questions.explanation: Let, the number of hens x and number of cows y ATQ, x + y = 48 ........ (i) and 2x + 4y = 140 ..... (ii) 4 x  (i)  −  (ii)  ⇒ 4 x + 4 y − 2 x − 4 y = 192 − 140 ⇒ 2 x = 52 ∴ x = 26 ∴  Number of hens  26 \begin{array}{l}4 x \text { (i) }- \text { (ii) } \\ \Rightarrow 4 x+4 y-2 x-4 y=192-140 \\ \Rightarrow 2 x=52 \therefore x=26 \\ \therefore \text { Number of hens } 26\end{array} 4 x  (i)  −  (ii)  ⇒ 4 x + 4 y − 2 x − 4 y = 192 − 140 ⇒ 2 x = 52 ∴ x = 26 ∴  Number of hens  26 ​

questions.question: A sales executive gets 20% bonus of the total sales value and 10% commission besides the bonus on the net profit after charging such commission. If the totals sales value be .Tk. 10 lakh per annum and the total profit of the company. be Tk. 1.32 lakh, then his total earning per annum will be (in lakh), given that he is not entitled to réceive any fixed salary from the company.
Find the diagonal of a rhombus if its area is 121 cm 2 ^2 2 and length measure of longest diagonal is 22 cm.
questions.explanation: Here, longest diagonal, d 1 = 22   c m \mathrm{d}_{1}=22 \mathrm{~cm} d 1 ​ = 22   cm and smallest diagonal d 2 \mathrm{d}_{2} d 2 ​ ∴  Area of a rhombus  = 1 2 × d 1 × d 2 ⇒ 121 = 1 2 × 22 × d 2 ⇒ d 2 = 121 × 2 22 = 11 \begin{array}{l} \therefore \text { Area of a rhombus }=\frac{1}{2} \times \mathrm{d}_{1} \times \mathrm{d}_{2} \\ \Rightarrow 121=\frac{1}{2} \times 22 \times \mathrm{d}_{2} \\ \Rightarrow \mathrm{d}_{2}=\frac{121 \times 2}{22}=11 \end{array} ∴  Area of a rhombus  = 2 1 ​ × d 1 ​ × d 2 ​ ⇒ 121 = 2 1 ​ × 22 × d 2 ​ ⇒ d 2 ​ = 22 121 × 2 ​ = 11 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ Length of the diagonal be 11 cm.

questions.question: When the price of rice is increased by 25 percent, a family reduces its consumption such that the expenditure is only 10 percent more than before. If 40 kg of rice is consumed by family before, then find the new consumption of family.
questions.explanation: Let, Initial price of rice per k g = 100 t k \mathrm{kg}=100 \mathrm{tk} kg = 100 tk ∴ \therefore ∴ Total price = ( 40 × 100 ) = 4000 t k =(40 \times 100)=4000 \mathrm{tk} = ( 40 × 100 ) = 4000 tk Now, In 10 % 10 \% 10% increase expenditure of rice = ( 400 × 110 100 ) = 4400 t k =\left(400 \times \frac{110}{100}\right)=4400 \mathrm{tk} = ( 400 × 100 110 ​ ) = 4400 tk Again, in 25 % 25 \% 25% increase, the price of rice = ( 100 + 25 ) = 125 t k =(100+25)=125 \mathrm{tk} = ( 100 + 25 ) = 125 tk ∴ \therefore ∴ Consumption of the family = 4400 125 = 35.2 =\frac{4400}{125}=35.2 = 125 4400 ​ = 35.2

questions.question: A , B , & C \mathrm{A}, \mathrm{B}, \& \mathrm{C} A , B , & C are the three angles of a triangle. If A − B = 15 ∘ \mathrm{A}-\mathrm{B}=15^{\circ} A − B = 1 5 ∘ and B − C = 30 ∘ B-C=30^{\circ} B − C = 3 0 ∘ . Then ∠ A \angle A ∠ A is equal to-
questions.explanation: A − B = 15 ∘ ∴ B = A − 15 ∘ A-B=15^{\circ} \therefore B=A-15^{\circ} A − B = 1 5 ∘ ∴ B = A − 1 5 ∘ And B − C = 30 ∘ \mathrm{B}-\mathrm{C}=30^{\circ} B − C = 3 0 ∘ . ⇒ C = B − 30 ∘ = A − 15 ∘ − 30 ∘ = A − 45 ∘ \Rightarrow \mathrm{C}=\mathrm{B}-30^{\circ}=\mathrm{A}-15^{\circ}-30^{\circ}=\mathrm{A}-45^{\circ} ⇒ C = B − 3 0 ∘ = A − 1 5 ∘ − 3 0 ∘ = A − 4 5 ∘ We, know that, A + B + C = 180 ∘ A+B+C=180^{\circ} A + B + C = 18 0 ∘ . ⇒ A + A − 15 ∘ + A − 45 ∘ = 180 ∘ ⇒ 3   A = 180 ∘ + 60 ∘ = 240 ∘ ∴ A = 240 ∘ 3 = 80 ∘ \begin{array}{l} \Rightarrow \mathrm{A}+\mathrm{A}-15^{\circ}+\mathrm{A}-45^{\circ}=180^{\circ} \\ \Rightarrow 3 \mathrm{~A}=180^{\circ}+60^{\circ}=240^{\circ} \\ \therefore \mathrm{A}=\frac{240^{\circ}}{3}=80^{\circ} \end{array} ⇒ A + A − 1 5 ∘ + A − 4 5 ∘ = 18 0 ∘ ⇒ 3   A = 18 0 ∘ + 6 0 ∘ = 24 0 ∘ ∴ A = 3 24 0 ∘ ​ = 8 0 ∘ ​ ∴ ∠ A \therefore \angle \mathrm{A} ∴ ∠ A is 80 ∘ 80^{\circ} 8 0 ∘

questions.question: Mike, steve, and David are contractors with a total of 440 clients between them. Steve has 3/8 the number of clients Mike has, and David has three times the number Steve has. How many clients does David have?
questions.explanation: Let, Mike has x clients Steve has 3 x 8 \frac{3 x}{8} 8 3 x ​ " And David , 3 × 3 x 8 , = 9 x 8 , \frac{3 \times 3 x}{8},=\frac{9 x}{8} , 8 3 × 3 x ​ , = 8 9 x ​ clients  ATQ,  x + 3 x 8 + 9 x 8 = 440 ⇒ 8 x + 3 x + 9 x 8 = 440 ⇒ 20 x = 3520 ∴ x = 176 ∴  David has  = 9 × 176 8 = 198  clients  \begin{array}{l} \text { ATQ, } x+\frac{3 x}{8}+\frac{9 x}{8}=440 \\ \Rightarrow \frac{8 x+3 x+9 x}{8}=440 \\ \Rightarrow 20 x=3520 \therefore x=176 \\ \therefore \text { David has }=\frac{9 \times 176}{8}=198 \text { clients } \end{array}  ATQ,  x + 8 3 x ​ + 8 9 x ​ = 440 ⇒ 8 8 x + 3 x + 9 x ​ = 440 ⇒ 20 x = 3520 ∴ x = 176 ∴  David has  = 8 9 × 176 ​ = 198  clients  ​

questions.question: An individual is cycling at a speed of 25 km per hour. He catches his predecessor who had started earlier in two hours. What is the speed in kmph of his predecessor who had started 3 hours earlier?
questions.explanation: Total distance covered in 2 hours = ( 25 × 2 ) = 50   k m =(25 \times 2)=50 \mathrm{~km} = ( 25 × 2 ) = 50   km Time taken by 1 st  1^{\text {st }} 1 st  individual = ( 2 + 3 ) = 5   h =(2+3)=5 \mathrm{~h} = ( 2 + 3 ) = 5   h ∴ \therefore ∴ The speed of predecessor = 50 5   k m / h = 10   k m / h =\frac{50}{5} \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h}=10 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h} = 5 50 ​   km / h = 10   km / h

questions.question: An employer pays Tk. 26 for each day a worker but forfeits Tk. 7 for each day he remains idle. At the end of 56 days, if the worker got Tk. 829, for how many days did the worker remain idle?
questions.explanation: Let, he works x x x days and remain idle ( 56 − x ) (56-x) ( 56 − x ) days ATQ, 26 x − 7 ( 56 − x ) = 829 ⇒ 26 x − 392 + 7 x = 829 26 \mathrm{x}-7(56-\mathrm{x})=829 \Rightarrow 26 \mathrm{x}-392+7 \mathrm{x}=829 26 x − 7 ( 56 − x ) = 829 ⇒ 26 x − 392 + 7 x = 829 ⇒ 33 x = 829 + 392 = 1221 ⇒ x = 37 \Rightarrow 33 x=829+392=1221 \Rightarrow x=37 ⇒ 33 x = 829 + 392 = 1221 ⇒ x = 37 ∴ \therefore ∴ Number of days remain idle = ( 56 − 37 ) = 19 =(56-37)=19 = ( 56 − 37 ) = 19 days

questions.question: Anil borrowed some money at simple interest. The rate of interest for the first 3 years was 5% for the next 2 years was 8% and for the next 4 years it was 10%. Beyond this it was 12% per annum. If he paid Tk. 8560, as interest for 12 years, how much money (in Tk.) did he borrow?

In order to pass in an exam, a student is required to get 975 marks out of the aggregate marks. Priyanka got 870 marks and was declared failed by 7%. What are the maximum aggregate marks a student can get in the examination?
questions.explanation: Priyanka failed by = (975-870) = 105 marks Now, 7% marks = 105 ∴ 100 % m a r k s = 105 × 100 7 = 1500 \therefore 100 \% \quad marks \quad=\frac{105 \times 100}{7}=1500 ∴ 100% ma r k s = 7 105 × 100 ​ = 1500 ∴ \therefore ∴ Maximum aggregate marks 1500

questions.question: To complete a work, A takes 50% more time than B. If together they take 18 days to complete the work, how many days shall B take to do it?
questions.explanation: Let, B B B takes x x x days And A A A takes ( x + x × 50 100 ) = 3 x 2 \left(x+x \times \frac{50}{100}\right)=\frac{3 x}{2} ( x + x × 100 50 ​ ) = 2 3 x ​ days They together complete in 1 day = ( 1 x + 2 3 x ) = 3 + 2 3 x = 5 3 x =\left(\frac{1}{x}+\frac{2}{3 x}\right)=\frac{3+2}{3 x}=\frac{5}{3 x} = ( x 1 ​ + 3 x 2 ​ ) = 3 x 3 + 2 ​ = 3 x 5 ​ parts ∴ 5 3 x = 1 18 ⇒ 3 x = 90 ∴ x = 30 \therefore \frac{5}{3 \mathrm{x}}=\frac{1}{18} \Rightarrow 3 \mathrm{x}=90 \therefore \mathrm{x}=30 ∴ 3 x 5 ​ = 18 1 ​ ⇒ 3 x = 90 ∴ x = 30 ∴ \therefore ∴ B takes 30 days.

questions.question: Out of three numbers, the first is twice the second and is half of the third. If the average of the three numbers is 56, then difference of first and third numbers is
questions.explanation: Let,  2 nd   number  = x 1 st   number  = 2 x  and  3 rd  , = 4 x  ATQ,  x + 2 x + 4 x = 3 × 56 ⇒ 7 x = 3 × 56 ⇒ x = 3 × 56 7 ∴ x = 24 \begin{array}{l} \text { Let, } 2^{\text {nd }} \text { number }=\mathrm{x} \\ 1^{\text {st }} \text { number }=2 \mathrm{x} \\ \text { and } 3^{\text {rd }},=4 \mathrm{x} \\ \text { ATQ, } x+2 x+4 x=3 \times 56 \\ \Rightarrow 7 \mathrm{x}=3 \times 56 \\ \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\frac{3 \times 56}{7} \therefore \mathrm{x}=24 \end{array}  Let,  2 nd   number  = x 1 st   number  = 2 x  and  3 rd  , = 4 x  ATQ,  x + 2 x + 4 x = 3 × 56 ⇒ 7 x = 3 × 56 ⇒ x = 7 3 × 56 ​ ∴ x = 24 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ Diffference of 1 st  1^{\text {st }} 1 st  and 3 rd  3^{\text {rd }} 3 rd  number = ( 4 x ˙ − 2 x ) =(4 \dot{x}-2 \mathrm{x}) = ( 4 x ˙ − 2 x ) = 2 x = 2 × 24 = 48 =2 \mathrm{x}=2 \times 24=48 = 2 x = 2 × 24 = 48

questions.question: In the following figure, ∠ B : ∠ C = 2 : 3 \angle B: \angle C=2: 3 ∠ B : ∠ C = 2 : 3 , find ∠ B + ∠ C \angle B+\angle C ∠ B + ∠ C .
questions.explanation: We know that, If a side of a triangle is produced, then exterior angle of ∠ A \angle \mathrm{A} ∠ A is equal to the sum of the two opposite interior angles ∠ B \angle B ∠ B and ∠ C \angle C ∠ C ∴ ∠ B + ∠ C = 130 ∘ \therefore \angle \mathrm{B}+\angle \mathrm{C}=130^{\circ} ∴ ∠ B + ∠ C = 13 0 ∘
